definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: The scheme has a present value of nearly $270, 000 to a new recipient.
sentences.chinese: 一位新的補助成員現在可以領取近27萬美元。

sentences.english: Second, it is utilized, at times, as a decoy for incorporating the opposition.
sentences.chinese: 其次，政府有時以補助做爲收編反對勢力的誘餌。

sentences.english: The final report should also include answers to the grant-specific questions.
sentences.chinese: 結案報告也需要包括補助金特定問題的答案。

sentences.english: In addition, streets adjacent to the taxpayer-subsidized complex will be closed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，由納稅者補助的聯合體附近的街道也將關閉。

sentences.english: Any person under the age of 18 is ineligible for benefit.
sentences.chinese: 未滿18歲者無資格領取補助金。

sentences.english: What do you think about subsidizing tuition fees?
No, I didn't get any subvention from Taiwan's government this year.
sentences.chinese: □否，本年度未獲任何經費補助。

sentences.english: Obama has spoken broadly about boosting affordable housing and restoring public housing subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬主張爲房主減負，並重新爲公共住房提供補助。

sentences.english: Last year surplus of HK$17 was set off against subvention received in current year.
sentences.chinese: 去年的17港元盈餘已與本年所收的補助金對銷。

sentences.english: On friday they added reliever grant balfour in a trade with the brewers.
sentences.chinese: 週五對他們補充救濟補助貝爾福在貿易與釀酒。

sentences.english: The incapacitated will need disability benefits.
sentences.chinese: 殘疾人將需要殘疾補助。

sentences.english: Income from government subvention is recognised on an accruals basis.
sentences.chinese: 政府補助金收入按應計制確認。

sentences.english: This case involved a Maryland bounty system for old, abandoned cars ("hulks").
sentences.chinese: 這個案例包括馬里蘭州的收集報廢汽車的補助制。

sentences.english: Affording government grants is a way of intervening in the economy affairs by the governments.
sentences.chinese: 政府補助是政府幹預經濟的一種手段。

sentences.english: Federal aid was granted to the depressed area where unemployment had risen to epidemic proportions.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦的補助金被撥到的失業狀況普遍流行的蕭條地區。

definition: variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
